snippet: "There's a great opportunity for the Petersen to expand from Southern California car culture into the world of cars as art, cars as freedom, and cars as solutions to transportation problems," said Peter Mullin, the new chairman of the Petersen...
abstract: "There's a great opportunity for the Petersen to expand from Southern California car culture into the world of cars as art, cars as freedom, and cars as solutions to transportation problems," said Peter Mullin, the new chairman of the Petersen Automotive Museum.

headline.main: New Chairman of Petersen Museum Sees Expansion Ahead
